ingredients.content: 250 g fresh fruit (e.g. berries), room temperature, cut into pieces as needed

preparations.content:
Place fresh fruit,  sugar and lemon juice into mixing bowl and blend 30 sec/speed 5 -10, increasing speed gradually.
Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Cook <b>5 min/90°C/speed 2<b>. Allow coulis to cool before serving.
